conbody.p: quiz administrator>viewing test results (teacher)Upon completion of the quiz, the teacher normally would initiate collection of test results in Dialog Nibelung teacher module (see ). When test results have been collected, the teacher can use View results button to open the Quiz Administrator window with results of the quiz ( ).
One can view results of the quiz using the Quiz Administrator module ( ).

image.alt: Quiz Administrator window with test results

conbody.p: Elements of the Quiz Administrator window:

row.entry: Open _fixme_ [ui] button to open a quiz file with test results;
Save all button to save all opened quizzes in their files;
Exit button to exit from the Quiz Administrator and close the window.
Quiz tabs for switching between multiple opened quizzes
Information button that will open a window with additional information for the quiz: author, creation date, and last modification date
Save button to save modified quiz results
Export to HTML button to export quiz results into an HTML file

conbody.p: Quiz title, course, quiz description, maximum score and grade, date the quiz was conducted, and class list with individual scores, grades and notes. You can edit scores, grades and notes by double clicking on the appropriate field. Press Save button (6) to save modified quiz results and/or notes.
You can use the Export to HTML button (7) to export quiz results into an HTML page that can be viewed in any browser, posted online, or printed out.
Press the View button in the Details _fixme_ [ui] column to see detailed results for individual students. This will launch the Quiz Player (see ) with this student quiz results.
